endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available real estate contract templates.
Upload a new real estate document template for customization and usage.
Fetch possible customization fields and settings for a specified document.
Generate a customized document using the provided template and user specifications.
Update an existing document with new information or changes.
Analyze a real estate contract for missing fields or inconsistencies.
Compare two real estate contracts and summarize their differences.
Retrieve example contract sections for drafting purposes.
Delete a specific document from the repository.
Update the status of a specific document, e.g., 'draft' or 'finalized'.
